normal.queries: [{"value":"select opt.code from sys_operator opt join SYS_OperatorRole otr on opt.oid = otr.soid join sys_role r on r.oid = otr.role where r.code = 'BankPaymentApplicant'"}]

normal.text: 更新银行付款单中间表人员代码
normal.description: 更新银行付款单中间表人员代码
normal.scriptContent:
update bank_payment_tmp_mid set requester_number= #[map-payload:requester_number] where invoice_id =#[map-payload:invoice_id]
dbop.saveOrUpdate("insert into TRINA_SL_INTERFACE_LOG(id,flow,node,billkey,oid,starttime,endtime,request_data,response_data,EXCEPTION,interface_type)values(Trina_SL_Interface_Log_ID_SEQ.Nextval,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)", o, false);

normal.text: 查询人员已停用的发票ID
normal.description: 查询人员已停用的发票ID
normal.scriptContent:
List < Map > data = dbop.select(" select invoice_id from bank_payment_tmp_mid a join oa_employee_h b on a.requester_number=b.code  where b.enable=-1", message);
return data;

String exceptionContent = message.getPayload();String exception = exceptionContent.replace("\n", "
");message.setPayload(exception);return message;
